title: Carl Fernandes
text: Carl Fernandes, a University of Toronto graduate with a major in Economics and minors in Statistics and Political Science, brings a robust foundation in data analytics and financial operations. His professional experience includes roles at Orkin Canada and Dubai Golf LLC, where he excelled in cash application, accounts receivable, and finance internships, showcasing his skill in managing significant financial transactions and conducting detailed data analysis. Adept in tools like Python, Stata, and ARGUS, and with a proven track record in academic projects and extracurricular leadership, Carl is poised to make a significant impact in economics and finance sectors.
